Summary: flashing light, star like, moving around
trends: There have been no other sightings in Carriere
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsfor almost two weeks now, my family and i have been witnessing an object in the northeastern sky that looks like a star from our porch. but this star moves. at first i thought maybe it was a drug helicopter flying over the woods. but it seemed to stay in the same area. after watching it for a few minutes i noticed it started to make these really quick movements, up and down, side to side and sometimes in a circular pattern at a high rate of speed. at times you can see flashing\strobing red and white lights on it. it is almost like it is trying to maintain a certain position. like maybe it is trying to appear as a star, but it is not doing a very good job of it. it does move up and over just as the stars do during the night, but the whole time it is bobbing and weaving. i have seen many planes and helicopters and know this is not either one of those. with seeing this i have been checking out the skies, and now the last two nights i have witnessed a number of other star looking objects which are also moving. last night 4\7\08 i witnessed a flash in the sky, and 3 lights move across the sky. i am not really familier with what sattelites look like when they pass, possibly that was what i saw move across the sky? but what are these star like lights that are moving around? this is kinda freaking me out a little, and i am trying not to alarm my family, but they have witnessed this as well. i have read a few reports that describe this same thing. what is going on here? after watching for a while, i usually have to go to bed, gotta work in the morning.
